reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering and pretty, with nice material and great quality. They describe it as comfortable and true to size, though some mention it runs a tad big. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some saying it fits well while others note the fitted waist looks small. Customers disagree on the value for money. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, classy, flatters hourglass.
items.body: Loved it! Ordered 3 different blue dresses for a fall wedding. This was the clear winner. Hourglass figure. 34 D bra. 5â€™6, 140. Small waist, booty pop. This dress in medium was perfect. Wore it with pointed tie flats and a solitaire diamond necklace. Easy, comfortable, got several compliments. Fitted waist looked small, compared to chest (slight cleavage) and hips but not in a clubbing tight way. The velvet dress I got looked clubbing tight. The other dress looked homely. Great value for the cost. Material is substantial and hid any nonperfect spots. Very wearable. Husband was shocked it was off Amazon. :) Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed!!!
items.body: This is my new absolute favorite dress. Wore it for my sister's wedding and excited to style it different ways. Classy, sexy and such a bold beautiful shade of green. Very good quality material, soft and sturdy. A little big on me around the bottom backside as im pretty small, but made for a more tasteful look as opposed to slim fitting. Definitely getting other colors. Read more
items.author: Anna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: Fits as expected. The material is nice but a bit hot. Material not made to breathe. I plan to wear it in the winter so maybe the material being thicker will be nice. Read more
items.author: Melinda Clark

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy!
items.body: I love this dress! Very flattering and true to size! Comfortable and great quality! I loved the green color Read more
items.author: Danielle

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap thin fabric
items.body: Very cheap fabric, definitely not worth the price. Read more
items.author: Sarah Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Flattering Dress
items.body: The dress was perfect right out of the package. This is a no wrinkle dress. I am 5â€™3 and 155 lbs. the large was a great fit for me. I will say that the V neck is a little low cut for me so I am going to sew 2 stitches in the bottom of the V and that should fix it. Everyone commented on the dress. Itâ€™s very flattering. I washed it in the machine with other clothes in cold water and hung it up to dry. Came out perfect. Iâ€™m a fan. Read more
items.author: wnb323

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and flattering

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a tad big
items.body: Runs a tad big but was exactly what I needed for my nephews wedding itâ€™s definitely stretchier than I expected, didnâ€™t cling to my curves like it should of if I maybe ordered a medium or maybe the medium would have been too tight IM NOT SUREâ€¦ it was definitely a little big but was just what I needed shorty notice and was comfortable to wear to the wedding Read more
items.author: Kaci N Grieger

short_description:
Womens Dress Ruched V Neck Bodycon Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Ruched V Neck Bodycon Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Navy, Wine Red, White, Coral, Grey Blue, Royal Blue, Nude Pink, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
